::DarkMouse:;

She looked at Paralysis. She whispered,"let's get back and warn 
Aracnia."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia moved away from Quickstrike, "Sorry, but right now we 
have to 
> stop Megatron. I hope Darkmouse and paralysis have gotten him."
> 
>     Paralysis saw the battle outside, but easily made it into the 
cave with a 
> little back door Darkmouse had informed him of earlier. The base 
was in 
> shambles, soon there was going to be a cave it. 
>  He continued deeper into the cave when he heard Megatron and 
Waspinator 
> yelling...
>     "Get out there and defend the cave you insect!" He bellowed, 
and 
> Waspinator threw down his wepon.
>     "No, Waspinator tir-" Thats all he got to say because Megatron 
batted his 
> head off and then turned to the frog.
>     He glared, "Aracnia sent you? Indeed....she should have come 
herself. No 
> matter. Soon you and everyone else on this planet will be dust, and 
I shall 
> claim triumph for the Decepticons once and for all! Yes!"
>     Paralysis opened fire on the windbag, sending him flying into a 
dark 
> corner. "You cant contact them with out a computer!"
>     With that, he blew apart the computers in the room, bit by bit. 
Smoke 
> filled the area, and Paralysis realized that Megatron was gone. And 
then the 
> fire eruppted.
> 
>     Megatron took his chance, gathered up Waspinator and fled from 
the cave. 
> It would be gone soon....and now that he couldnt contact the Armada 
it was 
> sure to leave. His minions, besides Waspinator, had grown quite 
bold and he 
> could do with out them. Besides, Kitkat was a far better leader.
>     Carrying Waspinator, he entered the swamps and ran as fast as 
he could. 
> He would have his revenge, One day.....
> 
>     The Armada, with the link severed, began its return trip home. 
The vesske 
> entered a warp corridor and vanished from view.
